languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that costs {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they gain +3 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} in the current {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Using an ability that costs wounds grants the Blade Dancer 3 movement points.
Whenever the Bladedancer uses an ability that costs wounds, they gain +3 MP in the current turn.

languages.text: 每当刀锋舞者使用会消耗{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，都会立刻获得3点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果仅限于当前{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

languages.text: ブレード・ダンサーが{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を消費する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するたび、その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+3追加される。
